message.name: ERR_ENT_USER_SEARCH_FILTER_FV_TYPE
message.locale: User search filter type must be provided.

message.name: ERR_ENT_USER_SEARCH_FILTER_RECORD_EXIST
message.locale: User search filter record already exists for specified user name and type.

message.name: ERR_ENT_USER_SEARCH_FILTER_XRV_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
message.locale: The search criteria exceeds the maximum limit of 1400. Therefore the query cannot be saved to the My Queries list.
